tool_description: Returns the main text from an article on the web as text/JSON. You provide the url, the service provides the content within.
name: Article Text
title: Article Text

api_list.name: article
api_list.description: Returns the text for the article found at a url

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Selects response type. Valid values text/json

optional_parameters.name: processor
optional_parameters.description: Selects which version of the processor you'd like to use, Valid values 1,2
